-1.title: V for Variety

episode of.title: The Surreal Life: Fame Games (TV Series 2007– )

-1.plot: A-Lister treats continue as that team is whisked off for a day of pampering while the B-Listers are left behind with a tonal masseur. The evening turns a little more surreal after a surprise visit from Adrianne Curry and Christopher Knight results in a full-frontal course of 'naked sushi' with all the cast members.

1.title: Welcome to Celebrity Island

episode of.title: The Surreal Life: Fame Games (TV Series 2007– )

1.plot: Ten of the most notable celebrities from the first six seasons of The Surreal Life have gathered together at a beautiful mansion in Las Vegas, Nevada to have their skills and notoriety put to the test to determine which famous face has the most game.

2.title: Sex, Size, and Videotape

episode of.title: The Surreal Life: Fame Games (TV Series 2007– )

2.plot: The clear division between the A" and "B" List becomes apparent as the A-listers receive star pampering at a Las Vegas show while the B's, stuck in their digs, get a less-than-stellar visit from "Marshmallow The Clown."

3.title: Down and Out on the B-List

episode of.title: The Surreal Life: Fame Games (TV Series 2007– )

3.plot: As the dreaded B-List swells to four members, the chasm between the two teams widens as the A-List continues to receive preferential treatment.

4.title: The Chyna Doll Syndrome

episode of.title: The Surreal Life: Fame Games (TV Series 2007– )

4.plot: The A-List team continues to get top drawer treatment as celebrity chef Todd English arrives at their doorstop to prepare an exquisite meal for them as the less fortunate B-List is 'treated' to a hot dog cart in the driveway.

5.title: Episode #1.5

episode of.title: The Surreal Life: Fame Games (TV Series 2007– )

5.plot:

6.title: Pretty Women

episode of.title: The Surreal Life: Fame Games (TV Series 2007– )

6.plot: The two teams of celebrities were challenged to separate the professional models from the Bunny Ranch's hookers.

7.title: Dial M for Mommy

episode of.title: The Surreal Life: Fame Games (TV Series 2007– )

7.plot: At this stage in the game 7 players remain. Team A-List and B-List are dissolved leaving each contestant alone in their battle for complete celebrity domination.

imdb.plot outline: The great thing about "The Surreal Life" is that every season the cast is always an odd but incredibly compelling mix of celebrities, everyone from A-Listers all the way down to... well, not A-Listers. The hierarchy of the casts' fame and the question of the level of each person's celebrity always seems to come into question. Well, now it's time for those questions to be answered and find out who is more famous than whom in the first ever "Surreal Life All-Star Challenge!" "The Surreal Life All-Star Challenge" is a show where 12 cast members from previous seasons of "The Surreal Life" will compete against each other in a fun and out-of-control elimination-style contest to see which celebrity is the most famous of them all! Throughout this 10-episode challenge, the celebrities will constantly fluctuate between the A-List, the B-List and the dreaded "Thanks for playing, see you later"-List, but by the competition's end, only one celebrity will remain to claim the grand prize of $100,000, bragging rights and the title of the most famous Surreal Life All-Star!
imdb.title: The Surreal Life: Fame Games
